Package tech.bytespot.mpesa_api.user

Class MpesaService

java.lang.Object
tech.bytespot.mpesa_api.user.MpesaService
All Implemented Interfaces:
MpesaServiceTemplate
@Singleton
public class MpesaService
extends java.lang.Object
implements MpesaServiceTemplate
Class holds functions called by the end user to access the libraries functionalities
Author:
eli_muraya on 16/10/2019 .

    Function used to send C2B registration request via Safaricom API
    C2B_Response c2bSimulateRequest​(C2B_SimulateRequest simulateRequest, MpesaConfiguration configurationClass)
    Function used to send C2B simulation request via Safaricom API
    MpesaGeneralResponse reversalRequest​(Reversal_Request request, MpesaConfiguration configurationClass)
    Function used to send reversal request via Safaricom API Reversals are only done for incoming requests ie STK Push or C2B.
    STK_Response stkPushRequest​(STKPush_Request request, MpesaConfiguration configurationClass)
    Function used to send STK Push to the provided number via Safaricom API
    STK_Response stkQueryRequest​(java.lang.String checkoutRequestId, MpesaConfiguration configurationClass)
    Checks the status for a previously sent STK push
    MpesaGeneralResponse transactionStatusRequest​(TransactionStatusRequest request, MpesaConfiguration configurationClass)
    Function used to send transaction status query request via Safaricom API
